sentences.en: Currently , Lam is on a two - year sabbatical from his school.
sentences.cn: 目前林东生正在休学校给他的两年公休假.

sentences.en: He already taken a one - year 1999 sabbatical.
sentences.cn: 他于是在1999年带薪离职一年.

sentences.en: He's been on sabbatical writing a novel.
sentences.cn: 他一直在休假写一部小说。

sentences.en: I've devoted my sabbatical to greenhouse trace gases.
sentences.cn: 我为了这温室示踪气体已经牺牲了我的休息日.

sentences.en: Marcello Lippi insists he will not be cutting short his sabbatical to return to Juventus.
sentences.cn: 马赛洛·皮坚称他不会提早缩短假期回归尤文图斯.

sentences.en: Perhaps I should have said: I'm taking a 1 sabbatical.
sentences.cn: 或许我应该说: 我正在休息中.

sentences.en: Professor Robins is on sabbatical this year.
sentences.cn: 罗宾士教授今年在度他的休假年.

sentences.en: Q: Why did you choose to take a sabbatical?
sentences.cn: 你为什么选择离开一年?

sentences.en: We take a sabbatical from trading to develop and research our trading rules.
sentences.cn: 我们暂停交易去研究和发展我们的交易规则.

sentences.en: Why did you decide to take this sabbatical from CSI?
sentences.cn: 你为什么会决定离开CSI去休假?

words.tran_cn: 休假（美国某些大学给大学教师每七年一次的）

phrases.tran_cn: 休假(原指美国大学教授每七年一次的休假年,现亦适用于其他领域的人员,休假时间可长达一年,支全薪或部分薪水)

trans.tran_en: a period when someone, especially someone in a university job, stops doing their usual work in order to study or travel
